name: Dangerous Roads Ahead
description:
"I needed to go home.

My car needed gas, and a lot of other things, but enough fuel to get home was enough for now. But still…

I should have just kept driving, even if it was a gamble on whether I’d make it or not.

I shouldn’t have stopped the car, I shouldn’t have gone into the station, I should have just kept going. But I didn’t. Now I just hope everything holds together while I find a way out.

No going back now."

In the year 199X, A team of game developers discovered a lost Commodore 64 game, and decided to remake it for the Playstation 1. Unbeknownst to them, they awoken great evils laying dormant in that Cassette Tape.

Created for Global Game Jam 2022

Credits:

Maxwell Kunze

Kyran Bush

Emma Steadman

Samuel Hundley
